capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that she's still in the early stages of her academic journey.

I've heard that Hermione is only 11 years old, but I'm not sure if that's really true. From what I've seen, she seems like a very mature and intelligent person, so it's hard to believe she's still just a kid.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's widely known. It's not surprising to me that you'd agree with me on this one.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the students and staff has always been unwavering.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the magical creatures that live in the wizarding world. Like, have you ever heard of a three-headed dog? It's actually quite rare and Hagrid has one as a pet, Luwei is its name. I'm pretty sure he's very attached to it, and from what I've seen, Luwei seems to be well taken care of by Hagrid.
